card.text: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: RB05 Cycle of the Damned
card.text: When Cycle of the Damned enters, if it was cast, return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. Whenever one or more creatures you control dies, put a soul counter on Cycle of the Damned, then mill X cards, where X is the number of soul counters on it.

card.name: RW06 Wastes Historian
card.text: Whenever one or more nonland noncreature permanents enter under your control, draw a card. This ability only triggers once each turn.

card.name: RW07 High Court Ambassador
card.text: Flash Flying, double strike Whenever High Court Ambassador enters, if you desecrated this turn, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step. (You desecrate if a card in your graveyard is cast, activated, or targeted by you.) Intrude 1WW

card.name: RU07 New Metal Vulture
card.text: Flying When New Metal Vulture deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, draw a card. 2U: New Metal Vulture gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: RR06 Raptor Outbreak
card.text: When Raptor Outbreak enters, create two Omen tokens. (They’re enchantments with “{2}, Sacrifice this: Surveil 2.”) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice an artifact or enchantment. When you do, create a 3/3 white Bird creature token with flying. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: RR07 Spirit of Ashen Scents
card.text: When Spirit of Ashen Scents enters, target nonland noncreature permanent an opponent controls gains “At the beginning of your end step, this permanent deals 2 damage to you.” and “{2}: Sacrifice this permanent.”

card.name: RB06 The Local Blightmaker
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink When The Local Blightmaker dies, you may search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. 1B, Exile The Local Blightmaker from your graveyard: Put your choice of a deathtouch or lifelink counter on target creature you control.

card.name: RB07 Spirit of Forgotten Names
card.text: Flying When Spirit of Forgotten Names enters, if you cast it, you may exile three target creatures from your graveyard. When you do, your opponent chooses one of those creatures. Put it onto the battlefield under your control with a finality counter on it. Then they lose life equal to the highest mana value among the two other exiled creatures.

card.name: RU03 Ancient Depths
card.text: When Ancient Depths enters, draw two cards. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile four target cards from your graveyard with different card types. When you do, Ancient Depths becomes a 4/4 blue Serpent creature with hexproof.

card.name: RW02 Mammoth Valley
card.text: When Mammoth Valley enters, create a 3/3 white Elephant creature token with vigilance. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile four target cards from your graveyard with different card types. When you do, Mammoth Valley becomes a 4/4 white Elephant creature with vigilance.

card.name: RM01 Chort Secretary
card.text: Double strike Whenever you desecrate, put a soul counter on Chort Secretary, then search your library for a card with mana value equal to the number of soul counters on it. Reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. This ability only triggers once each turn. (You desecrate if a card in your graveyard is cast, activated, or targeted by you.)

card.name: RM01 Demon of Painful Restraint
card.text: You may cast creature spells as though they had flash. {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability of a non-Demon creature source you control. At the beginning of your end step, if you have seven or more cards in hand, untap each creature you control.

card.name: RM02 Season of Harvest
card.text: When Season of Harvest enters, you may sacrifice a nonland permanent. When you do, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls. At the beginning of your end step, if you desecrated this turn, put a soul counter on Season of Harvest. Then if it has three or more soul counters on it, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens and put a flying counter on each of them. (You desecrate if a card in your graveyard is cast, activated, or targeted by you.)

card.name: RM91 Spectral Steed
card.text: When Spectral Steed enters, create a 2/3 blue and white Spirit Horse creature token. {U}, Discard Spectral Steed: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}. Intrude 1W

card.name: MB01 Spirit of Blind Scorn
card.text: Flying Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, target opponent sacrifices a permanent. Whenever you lose life, target opponent loses that much life.

card.name: RG08 Night of Ghastly Unrest
card.text: Flash At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Night of Ghastly Unrest. When you sacrifice Night of Ghastly Unrest, you draw a card and you gain 3 life. Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create an X/X white Spirit creature token, where X is that creature’s power.

card.name: RR08 Witch-King Decree
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you own an instant card in exile. This spell costs {1} less to cast if you own a sorcery card in exile. Witch-King Decree deals 4 damage to target opponent and each creature they control.

card.name: RU08 Stare at the Mirror
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Exile two of them face-down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may cast the exiled cards without paying their mana costs if their total mana values equal exactly four. Otherwise, put them into your hand. Passing 3UUU (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its passing cost if you attacked this turn. Then exile it.)

card.name: RW08 Banished from the Gates
card.text: Destroy target creature, enchantment, or planeswalker with mana value X or less, where X is the number of nonland permanent cards you own in exile.

card.name: RB08 Samosek, Self Inflicted Blade
card.text: Menace When Samosek attacks, exile up to one target card from your graveyard. When you do, search your library for a card with the same mana value but a different name from the exiled card. Reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.

card.name: MU02 Lady of Sorrows
card.text: Flying Whenever Lady of Sorrows attacks, surveil X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. If X is 7 or greater, draw that many cards instead. Whenever you desecrate, draw a card. This ability only triggers once each turn.

card.name: Theo, Mass Manipulator
card.text: Whenever you desecrate, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens. (You desecrate if a card in your graveyard is cast, activated, or targeted by you.) Whenever a creature you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Sacrifice three creatures: Theo, Mass Manipulator gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: The Black Knight
card.text: Menace, deathtouch, lifelink Protection from Demons, Spirits, and Horrors. Whenever you cast a black spell, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of black mana symbols in that spell’s mana cost.

card.name: Demon of Ominous Signs
card.text: Lifelink Whenever an opponent casts a spell with the same name as a permanent on the battlefield, they lose 3 life and you draw one card. {T}: Choose a card name. Create an Omen token with the chosen name. (Its an enchantment with “{2}, Sacrifice this: Surveil 2.”)

card.name: MM01 Vronos, Revenant
card.text: When Vronos, Revenant enters and the beginning of your upkeep, create an Omen token. (Its an enchantment with “2, Sacrifice this: Surveil 2.”) [+1]: Up to one other target nonland permanent phases out. [-3]: Target enchantment you control becomes a 3/3 Spirit enchantment creature with flying, vigilance, and hexproof.

card.name: UW06 Molar Raptor
card.text: Flying Whenever you sacrifice one or more permanents, Molar Raptor gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
